tldr: The `serde_yml` crate is no longer maintained, as indicated by the developer. Its last commit documents that `serde_yml` has served its purpose and will no longer receive updates.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using this package.
how_to_fix: Remove any `serde_yml` package from your application. Please take a look at serde_norway instead.
vulnerable_to: Use of Unmaintained Third Party Components
